constantValues: Activity that tracks the delivery of a letter. The activity can contain the electronic copy of the letter.

definitions.description: Activity that tracks the delivery of a letter. The activity can contain the electronic copy of the letter.

members.name: from

constantValues: Enter the account, contact, lead, or user who sent the letter.

members.description: Enter the account, contact, lead, or user who sent the letter.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Contact and KnowledgeArticle and Account and KnowledgeBaseRecord' adds the 'regardingObjectId' attribute below to the 'Letter' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: regardingObjectId

constantValues: Choose the record that the letter relates to.

value.description: Choose the record that the letter relates to.

members.name: directionCode

constantValues: Select the direction of the letter as incoming or outbound.

members.description: Select the direction of the letter as incoming or outbound.

members.name: isBilled

constantValues: Shows whether the letter activity was billed as part of resolving a case.

members.description: Shows whether the letter activity was billed as part of resolving a case.

members.name: address

constantValues: Type the complete recipient address for the letter to ensure timely delivery.

members.description: Type the complete recipient address for the letter to ensure timely delivery.

members.name: scheduledStart

constantValues: Enter the expected due date and time.

members.description: Enter the expected due date and time.

members.name: subject

constantValues: Type a short description about the objective or primary topic of the letter.

members.description: Type a short description about the objective or primary topic of the letter.

members.name: BCC

constantValues: Enter the recipients that are included in the letter distribution, but are not displayed to other recipients.

members.description: Enter the recipients that are included in the letter distribution, but are not displayed to other recipients.

members.name: subcategory

constantValues: Type a subcategory to identify the letter type and relate the activity to a specific product, sales region, business group, or other function.

members.description: Type a subcategory to identify the letter type and relate the activity to a specific product, sales region, business group, or other function.

members.name: actualEnd

constantValues: Enter the actual end date and time of the letter. By default, it displays the date and time when the activity was completed or canceled, but can be edited to capture the actual time to create and send the letter.

members.description: Enter the actual end date and time of the letter. By default, it displays the date and time when the activity was completed or canceled, but can be edited to capture the actual time to create and send the letter.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Activity' adds the 'activityId' attribute below to the 'Letter' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: activityId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the letter activity.

value.description: Unique identifier of the letter activity.

members.name: actualDurationMinutes

constantValues: Type the number of minutes spent creating and sending the letter. The duration is used in reporting.

members.description: Type the number of minutes spent creating and sending the letter. The duration is used in reporting.

members.name: isWorkflowCreated

constantValues: Shows whether the letter activity was created by a workflow rule.

members.description: Shows whether the letter activity was created by a workflow rule.

members.name: scheduledEnd

constantValues: Enter the expected due date and time.

members.description: Enter the expected due date and time.

members.name: scheduledDurationMinutes

constantValues: Scheduled duration of the letter activity, specified in minutes.

members.description: Scheduled duration of the letter activity, specified in minutes.

members.name: statusCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'Letter' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
arguments.name: statusCode_display

members.description: Select the letter's status.

members.name: category

constantValues: Type a category to identify the letter type, such as sales offer or past due notice, to tie the letter to a business group or function.

members.description: Type a category to identify the letter type, such as sales offer or past due notice, to tie the letter to a business group or function.

members.name: CC

constantValues: Enter the recipients that should be copied on the letter.

members.description: Enter the recipients that should be copied on the letter.

members.name: to

constantValues: Enter the account, contact, lead, or user recipients for the letter.

members.description: Enter the account, contact, lead, or user recipients for the letter.

members.name: stateCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Letter' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
arguments.name: stateCode_display

constantValues: Shows whether the letter is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled letters are read-only and can't be edited.

members.description: Shows whether the letter is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled letters are read-only and can't be edited.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type the letter body or additional information to describe the letter, such as the primary message or the products and services described.

members.description: Type the letter body or additional information to describe the letter, such as the primary message or the products and services described.

members.name: priorityCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'priorityCode_display' is added to the 'Letter' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'priorityCode'
arguments.name: priorityCode_display

constantValues: Select the priority so that preferred customers or critical issues are handled quickly.

members.description: Select the priority so that preferred customers or critical issues are handled quickly.

members.name: actualStart

constantValues: Enter the actual start date and time for the letter. By default, it displays the date and time when the activity was created, but can be edited to capture the actual time to create and send the letter.

members.description: Enter the actual start date and time for the letter. By default, it displays the date and time when the activity was created, but can be edited to capture the actual time to create and send the letter.

members.name: importSequenceNumber

constantValues: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

members.description: Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.

members.name: activityTypeCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'activityTypeCode_display' is added to the 'Letter' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'activityTypeCode'
arguments.name: activityTypeCode_display

members.description: Shows the type of activity.

members.name: isRegularActivity

constantValues: Shows whether the activity is a regular activity type or event type.

members.description: Shows whether the activity is a regular activity type or event type.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Currency' adds the 'transactionCurrencyId' attribute below to the 'Letter' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: transactionCurrencyId

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

value.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.name: processId

constantValues: Shows the ID of the process.

members.description: Shows the ID of the process.

members.name: stageId

constantValues: Shows the ID of the stage.

members.description: Shows the ID of the stage.

members.name: traversedPath
members.description: For internal use only.

arguments.name: addedAttribute

arguments.name: addedAttribute

members.name: onHoldTime

constantValues: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

members.description: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

members.name: lastOnHoldTime

constantValues: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

members.description: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

constantValues: Shows the date and time by which the activities are sorted.

members.description: Shows the date and time by which the activities are sorted.
